ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'It makes no difference to us whether you preach or do not preach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "It is the same to us if you warn us or do not warn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They replied: "It is all the same for us whether you admonish us or not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "Whether you preach to us or not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “It is the same for us, whether you advise us or not be of the preachers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "It is the same to us whether you preach or be not of those who preach."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: It is the same to us whether you admonish or are not one of the admonishers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Alike it is to us, whether thou admonishest, or art not one of the admonishers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: It is all one to us whether thou preachest or art not of those who preach;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "It makes no difference to us whether you preach or do not preach,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: it is equal unto us whether thou admonishest or art not of the admonishers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘It is the same to us whether you exhort us or not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "It is the same to us whether thou admonish us or be not among (our) admonishers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "It is the same to us whether you preach or be not of those who preach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'It is the same to us whether you admonish or whether you are not one of the admonishers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “It is the same for us, whether you lecture us, or do not lecture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:136] They said, ‘It is the same to us whether you admonish [us] or are not one of those who admonish, anyway. In other words, we will not heed your admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: It is all one to us whether thou preachest) you warn us (or art not of those who preach) or you are a warner to us;
